sakai:title: Talks.cam - Featured talks.
sakai:shortDescription: Show the featured talks from talks.cam.ac.uk.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "limit", "description" : "Limit the amount of feeds you want."}
sakai:description: Get the latest featured talks from talks.cam.ac.uk.
sakai:response: Will return a JSON representation of the iCal data that gets sent back from talks.cam.ac.uk.
